fields.html:
{% load verbatim %}
<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html ng-app="Redwood">
<head>
  <title>Start</title>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}js/jquery.min.js"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}js/jquery-ui-1.10.3.custom.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}js/bootstrap-3.1.1.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}flot/jquery.flot.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}flot/jquery.flot.dashes.js"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}angular/angular-1.2.16.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}js/redwoodCore.js"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}js/redwoodHelpers.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}js/redwoodSubject.js"></script>
  <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}experiment/discretematrix/discreteMatrixStart.js"></script>
  <link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="{{ STATIC_URL }}css/bootstrap-3.1.1.min.css">
	<script type="text/javascript">
		var IMAGE_URL = "{{ STATIC_URL }}/img/Discrete Matrix";
		{{ js }}
	</script>
	<style type="text/css">
		{{ css }}
	</style>
</head>

<body style="padding-top:80px;" ng-controller="SubjectCtrl" ng-include="'/static/experiment/discreteMatrix/discreteMatrixStart.html'"></body>

</html>
fields.name: Start
